visualization.name: Multiple Sequence Alignment and Sequence Logo
visualization.help:
# What is Alignment Viewer?
This tool provides an **interactive multiple sequence alignment (MSA) viewer** powered by **Alignment Viewer 2.0**. It is written in TypeScript with the React framework and designed for high performance, enabling visualization and analysis of very large alignments directly in the browser.
## Key Features
- **Scalable Visualization**: View entire alignments or zoom in to individual residues. - **Sequence Types**: Supports DNA, RNA, and protein alignments in FASTA or Stockholm format. - **Analysis Tools**: Displays sequence logos, consensus sequences, conservation, and gap statistics. - **Sorting & Styling**: Sort alignments and choose from multiple color schemes. - **Customizable Interface**: Show or hide components as needed. - **Interactive Exploration**: Mouse-over and click events for deeper inspection. - **Client-Side Only**: Runs fully in the browser with no server dependency.
Learn more at: [https://github.com/sanderlab/AlignmentViewer2.0](https://github.com/sanderlab/AlignmentViewer2.0)
